source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000010_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>(-Distressed Townsman-)Sin eaters sighted! They're coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000010_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>Sie kommen! Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger im Anflug!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Excellent. The barrier is holding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Na also, das Schutzfeld hält!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000030_ALISAIE<tab>That's good news for the Crystarium, but what of the rest of Lakeland?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000030_ALISAIE<tab>Damit dürfte die Stadt vorerst sicher sein. Was machen wir als Nächstes?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyna and the city guard have taken to the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Der Angriff hat begonnen. Lyna und ihre Wachsoldaten werden überall im Seenland herausgefordert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thancred and the others have already joined them. Let us do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thancred und die anderen sind auch schon auf dem Schlachtfeld. Lassen wir sie nicht warten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000060_RYNE<tab>There are so many...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000060_RYNE<tab>Es sind einfach zu viele!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000070_LYNA<tab>Godsdammit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000070_LYNA<tab>Uh<var 1D /var>... Ahhh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000080_RYNE<tab>Lyna!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000080_RYNE<tab>Lyna!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000090_RYNE<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000090_RYNE<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000100_RYNE<tab>Lyna, hold on!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000100_RYNE<tab>Lyna, halte durch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000110_LYNA<tab>They...they turned on me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000110_LYNA<tab>Pass auf<var 1D /var>...! Ein paar<var 1D /var>... haben sich<var 1D /var>... verwandelt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000120_THANCRED<tab>(COUGHING BLOOD)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000120_THANCRED<tab>Pah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000130_RYNE<tab>Thancred!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000130_RYNE<tab>Thancred!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000140_THANCRED<tab>This...one...is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000140_THANCRED<tab>Lass die Finger von ihr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000150_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>We need only hold out a little while longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000150_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Komm schon! Beiß die Zähne zusammen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000160_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Reinforcements are coming, remember? The captain said so. We're going to be all right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000160_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Bald kommt die Verstärkung. Dann sind wir gerettet! Halte durch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Run! Run, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>He! Macht, dass ihr da weg kommt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000180_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>The Warrior of Darkness has returned. The bloody <var 1A 02 /var>night<var 1A 01 /var> has returned! So stay with me, eh? You can't go dying now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000180_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab><var 08 E905 ((Die Kriegerin)) ((Der Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit hat uns die Nacht zurückgebracht. Alles wird gut<var 08 E905 (( werden)) (()) /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Godsdammit! Please let this work, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var> let this work...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Lass sie in Ruhe, du Ungeheuer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(WHIFF GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000210_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>No! N-No, stay back! Stay back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000210_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Uah!<var 1D /var>... Bleib weg! Nein! Neiiin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000220_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Help, help! Someone, anyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000220_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Uaaahhh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Why did you spare <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? Why? What have I done to deserve this <var 1A 02 /var>mercy<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Verdammt noch mal! Nichts kann ich ausrichten! Was soll ich überhaupt hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000240_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Forward! <var 1A 02 /var>Forward<var 1A 01 /var>! If you can still hold a sword, follow me! Wounded, to the rear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000240_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Vorwärts, vorwärts! Nicht aufgeben! Wer kämpfen kann, kämpft! Die Verletzten ziehen sich zurück!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000250_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Weapons at the ready! Let's make this count!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000250_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Noch haben wir nicht verloren! Schließt die Formation!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Fight and struggle. Seek salvation by your own hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Heldenmut in einer Welt, die ihre Helden längst vergessen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Though the losses be grave, endure them. Though the victories be hollow, claim them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ein Sieg, errungen mit dem letzten Atemzug, doch zu welchem Preis? Zu welchem Preis?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000280_LYNA<tab>Oh. I did not see you there. Is there something you need?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000280_LYNA<tab>Ah, du bist es. Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>No, no, I'm fine. How are you feeling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wie geht es dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Shouldn't you be resting? What would the guard do without their captain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Deine Soldaten brauchen dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000290_LYNA<tab>Injuries are part and parcel of battle. While there's breath in my lungs, I shall see my duties done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000290_LYNA<tab>Es war ein blutiger Kampf und ich hab ganz schön was abbekommen. Aber ich lebe, das zählt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000300_LYNA<tab>...Appoint another. A captain's place is with her soldiers in the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000300_LYNA<tab>Du sagst es. Wir haben keine Zeit zu verschenken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000310_LYNA<tab>Don't pretend you are not of the same mind. You fought well today. Saved a great many lives. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000310_LYNA<tab>Ich möchte dir im Namen von uns allen danken. Ohne dich hätten wir womöglich noch größere Verluste erlitten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000320_LYNA<tab>Unfortunately, this war is far from over. We must replenish our ranks and shore up our defenses before they attack again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000320_LYNA<tab>Ich kümmere mich darum, dass die Wache so schnell wie möglich wieder einsatzbereit ist. Der nächste Angriff wird nicht lange auf sich warten lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000330_LYNA<tab>Now, if you will excuse me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000330_LYNA<tab>Jetzt entschuldige mich bitte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000340_LYNA<tab>(FALLING TO GROUND REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000340_LYNA<tab>Ha ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000350_LYNA<tab>I...am fine...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000350_LYNA<tab>Es tut weh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000360_LYNA<tab>Completely...and utterly...fine! Better than fine! Hale and hearty and still alive to mourn those who are not. Who I failed to protect when they needed me most.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000360_LYNA<tab>Verdammt, verdammt, verdammt. Was ist der Schmerz meiner Wunden gegen die Schuld, meine Soldaten in den Tod geführt zu haben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000370_LYNA<tab>We've come so far─so <var 1A 02 /var>godsdamned<var 1A 01 /var> far! I could have sworn the end was in sight. And now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000370_LYNA<tab>Sie alle hatten eine bessere Zukunft verdient. So viele von ihnen werden sie nun nicht mehr erleben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000380_LYNA<tab>Now they will never see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000380_LYNA<tab>Ausgerechnet jetzt<var 1D /var>... wo sie zum Greifen nahe ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000390_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Impudent worms of the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000390_VAUTHRY<tab>Hört her, einfältige Bewohner von Crystarium!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000400_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)The tragedy that has befallen you is of your own making. Divine retribution for your defiance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000400_VAUTHRY<tab>Hier spricht Vauthry, Herrscher von Eulmore. Dieser Angriff war eine göttliche Strafe, um euch eure Torheit vorzuführen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000410_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)The heavens have bequeathed to you a benevolent savior─me! I offer you freedom from pain and suffering─a paradise where man and sin eater might live in peace and harmony...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000410_VAUTHRY<tab>Die sterbende Welt hat mich geboren, damit ich euch ein Paradies erschaffe. Ich bin die letzte Hoffnung! Denn ich bin mit den Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern über einen unauflösbaren Pakt verbunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000420_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Why, already our winged brothers and sisters regard me and mine as kin, alike to them in beauty and purity!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000420_VAUTHRY<tab>Die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger verschonen mich und die Meinen. Und warum? Weil wir frei von Sünde sind!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000430_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)But you─you not only reject my proffered hand, but raise your own against my sin eaters. 'Tis only right that they respond in kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000430_VAUTHRY<tab>Ihr hingegen versinkt tiefer und tiefer im Morast der Schuld. Ihr stellt euch auf die Seite derer, die die Sündervertilger jagen und morden, anstatt meiner Verheißung zu folgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000440_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Let this be a lesson to all those who would walk the path of sin─the wicked shall not inherit this world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000440_VAUTHRY<tab>Erkennt euren Irrtum! Bereuet, tut Buße! Fügt euch der Ordnung und findet Erlösung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friends. With your aid we have weathered a brutal assault...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Danke, dass ihr alle gekommen seid. Lasst mich zuerst etwas zum Angriff der Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger sagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000460_EMETSELCH<tab>Sorry I'm late. Though I would not have been had anyone thought to notify me in advance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000460_EMETSELCH<tab>Ooh, bitte verzeiht die Verspätung, aber mir hat einfach niemand Bescheid gesagt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...As I was saying, it was only with your aid that we weathered this assault. Without it, the Crystarium and all who dwell here would now be gone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ihr habt uns während des Angriffs heldenhaft zur Seite gestanden. Ich danke euch, im Namen der ganzen Stadt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000480_ALPHINAUD<tab>For each we saved, another perished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es hat nicht gereicht, die vielen Schäden zu verhindern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is anything else we can do to help─anything at all─you need only ask. This is our home too, and we want nothing more than to keep it safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Crystarium ist unser zweites Zuhause geworden. Wenn es irgendetwas gibt, das wir tun können, sag es uns bitte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you. We are blessed to have you with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vielen Dank. Euer Zuspruch bedeutet uns sehr viel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for the attack itself─Vauthry may call it divine retribution, but sin eaters are creatures of instinct. A coordinated assault is unprecedented.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vauthry bezeichnete den Angriff als „göttliche Strafe“. Ich bezweifle aber, dass die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger willentlich gekommen sind, um uns zu strafen. Sie sind reine Instinktwesen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Moreover, in the absence of a Lightwarden, there should have been no compulsion for lesser sin eaters to congregate here en masse. All of which points to a single, unavoidable conclusion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ganz zu schweigen davon, dass die niederrangigen unter ihnen die vom Licht befreiten Gebiete eigentlich meiden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000530_URIANGER<tab>...That these minions of light answer to a higher power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000530_URIANGER<tab>Man kann nur einen Schluss daraus ziehen: Jemand hat die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger gesteuert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000540_URIANGER<tab>He who did claim kinship with them─who did boast of control, not in idleness, 'twould seem, but in earnest. Lord Vauthry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000540_URIANGER<tab>Und ich denke, er hat sich uns selbst offenbart. Lord Vauthry höchst<var 16 /var>persön<var 16 /var>lich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed. What I mistook for bluster was in fact the truth. The sin eaters are his to command. But if he imagines this show of force will convince us to bend the knee, he is sorely mistaken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, das denke ich auch. Und deshalb dürfen wir uns ihm auf keinen Fall unterwerfen. Genau das wäre der Untergang, den er uns prophezeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000560_ALISAIE<tab>I take it your meeting in Eulmore did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> end well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000560_ALISAIE<tab>Da fällt mir ein, was ist eigentlich aus deinem Besuch in Eulmore geworden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You could say that, yes. But I am wiser for the experience, nevertheless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das Gespräch war alles andere als ergiebig, aber ich habe dennoch etwas sehr Interessantes in Erfahrung gebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It appears he has mastered a technique which allows him to enslave the minds of others. A fact I discovered when he attempted to use it on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vauthry ist in der Lage, andere zu verhexen und gefügig zu machen. Er hatte mich nur herbeizitiert, um mich zu seiner Marionette zu machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>That would go some way towards explaining the peculiar reverence afforded him by his subjects.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir haben gesehen, wie Vauthry in Eulmore verehrt wird. Es ist nicht normal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>There may feasibly be a handful of true believers among them, I suppose, but it would not surprise me if the vast majority were in his thrall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Manche jubeln ihm bestimmt auch aus freien Stücken zu, aber wir müssen davon ausgehen, dass er über die ganze Bevölkerung eine starke mentale Kontrolle ausübt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Had I not anticipated his treachery, I might well have joined them. But seeing his invitation for what it was, I sent a glamour in my stead. I rather doubt such tricks will avail me a second time, however.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diesmal konnte ich mich mit einer Illusion schützen. Aber eine direkte Konfrontation wäre äußerst gefährlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Did you have any luck tracking down the Lightwarden in Kholusia?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Was ist mit der Suche nach dem Licht<var 16 /var>bringer auf Kholusia? Hast du etwas herausgefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sadly, I have nothing to report on that front. What of Amh Araeng?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nein, leider konnte ich nichts in Erfahrung bringen, was uns weiterhilft. Und du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000640_ALISAIE<tab>After a fruitless few days scouring ruins, I resorted to asking the locals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000640_ALISAIE<tab>Ich hab ein paar Ruinen untersucht, auch ohne Erfolg. Also ging ich dazu über, mich hier und da umzuhören.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000650_ALISAIE<tab>While no one I spoke to had seen any sign of the Warden, I did uncover a possible lead: an abandoned mine in western Amh Araeng. From what the Mord told me, it would be a perfect place to stay out of sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000650_ALISAIE<tab>Vielleicht ist es ja nichts, aber ein Mordh sprach von einem stillgelegten Bergwerk westlich von Amh Araeng, das ein perfektes Versteck sein könnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, I could never hope to explore such a labyrinth quickly or safely on my own, so I returned here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Das Bergwerk ist riesig. Ich habe mir ein paar Stollen angesehen, aber alles alleine abzusuchen würde ewig dauern. Also bin ich erst einmal zurückgekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000670_YSHTOLA<tab>Even should we all join in the endeavor, an exhaustive search could take weeks─and with no guarantee of finding anything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000670_YSHTOLA<tab>Hm, das ist ein Anhaltspunkt. Aber nicht genug, um den nächsten Schritt zu planen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000680_RYNE<tab>The Wardens harbor vast reservoirs of primordial Light, do they not? Far beyond anything found in lesser sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000680_RYNE<tab>Ähm<var 1D /var>... Die Licht<var 16 /var>bringer strahlen doch ein starkes Licht aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000690_RYNE<tab>And isn't it true that the Oracle could see the Light of a sin eater from malms away? Surely a Warden would seem like a blazing beacon by comparison?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000690_RYNE<tab>Müsste dann nicht das Orakel des Lichts diese Lichtquelle aufspüren können?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000700_RYNE<tab>To the real Oracle of Light, I mean. The real Minfilia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000700_RYNE<tab>Nicht ein Abbild wie ich<var 1D /var>... Ich meine das echte Orakel. Minfilia müsste es können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000710_RYNE<tab>If we traveled to Amh Araeng, to the south where she halted the Flood, I could summon her back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000710_RYNE<tab>Am Südende von Amh Araeng, dort wo das Orakel die Lichtflut aufgehalten hat. Dort werden wir sie zurückrufen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000720_RYNE<tab>What do you think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000720_RYNE<tab>So ist es doch, oder, Thancred?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000730_THANCRED<tab>...Don't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000730_THANCRED<tab>Nein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000740_RYNE<tab>Don't what? Do what I can? What we both know is right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000740_RYNE<tab>Doch, es ist möglich! Es muss möglich sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000750_THANCRED<tab>Do not presume to know my mind. You have no idea what you're proposing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000750_THANCRED<tab>Hör auf. Du weißt ja gar nicht, wovon du da redest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000760_RYNE<tab>But I do! I know why you never said anything. Because you thought you could keep me safe by keeping me in the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000760_RYNE<tab>Doch, das weiß ich ganz genau. Du hast mir zwar nie etwas erzählt<var 1D /var>... weil du so nett bist und mich beschützen wolltest!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000770_RYNE<tab>And...maybe I thought so too. But I knew, Thancred. I always knew!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000770_RYNE<tab>Aber ich spüre Dinge, und ich bin neugierig. Glaubst du denn wirklich, dass ich mir in meinem Inneren keine Fragen stelle?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, I see... I thought you were a rather underwhelming reincarnation, but it all makes sense now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich seh schon. So eine Wiedergeburt scheint keine einfache Angelegenheit zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>The Oracle lies dormant within you, doesn't she? But to draw on her true power, you must become one, both body and soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>Das Orakel schläft noch im Körper dieses Mädchens. Um die ganze Kraft zu wecken, müssen beide vollständig eins werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>To wit, one being must consume the other. Who shall be the lucky winner?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich fürchte, das wird nur eine von beiden überstehen. Entweder die Seele des Orakels oder die Seele des Mädchens. Wer wird es bloß werden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000810_THANCRED<tab>This doesn't concern you, Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000810_THANCRED<tab>Halt dich da raus. Die Sache geht dich gar nichts an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000820_EMETSELCH<tab>But it plainly concerns you. Which is why your heart is ready to burst out of your chest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000820_EMETSELCH<tab>Das stimmt. Aber geht es dich denn etwas an? Du scheinst dich ja sehr um das Wohl des Mädchens zu sorgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000830_EMETSELCH<tab>Despite the raging tempest in your bosom, however, you have never once opened up to your young charge. Now why would that be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000830_EMETSELCH<tab>Solltet ihr dann nicht offen und ehrlich miteinander reden? Warum hast du die Wahrheit vor ihr verborgen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000840_EMETSELCH<tab>Love...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000840_EMETSELCH<tab>Ist es etwa Liebe?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000850_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, I for one think it's a marvelous idea. Certainly more promising than any of your other suggestions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000850_EMETSELCH<tab>Aber das geht mich nun wirklich nichts an. Ich meine bloß, dass der Vorschlag des Mädchens durchaus Aussicht auf Erfolg hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000860_EMETSELCH<tab>So─it's off to Amh Araeng we go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000860_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich nehme an, euer nächstes Ziel ist also Nabaath Areng?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000870_THANCRED<tab>I'll meet you at the gates.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000870_THANCRED<tab>Ich bereite alles für die Reise vor. Wir treffen uns am Stadtausgang.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000880_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Take comfort in the bonds you share. Accept the pain when the time comes to part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000880_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Auf Wanderers Wegen geben sich Begegnung und Abschied die Hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000890_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Press on, for joy and sorrow walk hand in hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000890_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Schreite forsch voran, denn Freud und Leid sind Teil der Reise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Beyond Mount Garik lie the Hills of Amber, beneath which run hidden veins of mineral wealth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wer den Garik-Pass überschreitet, blickt auf die Bernsteinhügel<var 1D /var>- gefüllt mit Schätzen aus Erz und Mineralien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or <var 1A 02 /var>ran<var 1A 01 /var>, at least. Mayhap they are spent. Or mayhap the ringing of hammers <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> yet be heard below...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Die meisten davon sind längst gehoben. Nur in wenigen Schächten hallt noch das kalte Klirren der Spitzhacken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000920_THAFFE<tab>Magnus's wife was a miner, you know. Greatest prospector there ever was.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000920_THAFFE<tab>Die Frau von Meister Magnus war eine tüchtige Mi<var 16 /var>nen<var 16 /var>ar<var 16 /var>bei<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>rin. Vielleicht die beste, die wir je hatten. Man nannte sie die Erzkönigin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000930_THAFFE<tab>When the golem hearts started failing, she was the first to head out in search of more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000930_THAFFE<tab>Als bekannt wurde, dass der Talos ein neues Herz brauchte, machte sie sich ohne zu zögern auf die Suche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000940_THAFFE<tab>Problem was, most of the veins ran dry ages ago, and finding fresh ones to tap's only gotten harder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000940_THAFFE<tab>Aber die Mine ist berüchtigt dafür, dass sie ihre Schätze nicht so leicht preisgibt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000950_THAFFE<tab>But she wasn't one to be deterred. She just kept digging deeper and deeper. And then the mine collapsed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000950_THAFFE<tab>In einem Schacht, tief unter der Erde, gab plötzlich die Decke nach und begrub die Erzkönigin unter sich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000960_THAFFE<tab>We labored day and night to clear away the rubble, but it took us two months to find her...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000960_THAFFE<tab>Wir ruhten weder Tag noch Nacht, um den Schacht freizulegen. Trotzdem dauerte es zwei Monde, bis wir zu ihr vorgedrungen waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000970_THAFFE<tab>...To find her body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000970_THAFFE<tab>Da war sie schon lange tot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000980_THAFFE<tab>Magnus has never been the same since.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000980_THAFFE<tab>Meister Magnus hat den Verlust nicht verkraftet. Ihr habt ja selbst gesehen<var 1D /var>... Bitte habt etwas Verständnis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000990_THANCRED<tab>Where is he, if you don't mind my asking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000990_THANCRED<tab>Wo ist er eigentlich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001000_THAFFE<tab>Ah, yes, well...if he's not here, there's only one other place he'd be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001000_THAFFE<tab>Er ist gerade eben gegangen. Aber ich weiß schon, wo ihr ihn finden könnt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001010_MAGNUS<tab>What? Oh... You again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001010_MAGNUS<tab>Du schon wieder. Gibst wohl nicht so leicht auf, was?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001020_MAGNUS<tab>How many times must I tell you─the trolley won't run! We'd be better off dismantling the damn thing and selling the parts for scrap.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001020_MAGNUS<tab>Selbst wenn ich euch helfen wollte, die Bergbahn bewegt sich keinen Ilm mehr. Die taugt nur noch, um sie zu verschrotten und daraus Fässer und Eimer zu machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001030_MAGNUS<tab>Now piss off back to wherever you came from, and don't let me catch you around here again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001030_MAGNUS<tab>Also, lass mich gefälligst in Ruhe und verschwinde von hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001040_THANCRED<tab>...What were their names?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001040_THANCRED<tab>Wie waren ihre Namen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001050_MAGNUS<tab>My son was named Skuli. My wife, Agna.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001050_MAGNUS<tab>Meine Frau hieß Agna und mein Sohn Skuri.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001060_MAGNUS<tab>Being here with them...it beats going home. Home stopped being home when I lost them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001060_MAGNUS<tab>Seit sie weg sind, hab ich keinen Grund mehr, nach Hause zu gehen. Ich ertrag die Einsamkeit nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001070_MAGNUS<tab>I thought to try and drown my sorrows...but somehow...the bottle's never deep enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001070_MAGNUS<tab>Ich sauf und sauf, um meine Trauer zu vergessen, doch ich sink nur immer tiefer in sie rein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001080_THANCRED<tab>No bottle is. Believe me─I know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001080_THANCRED<tab>Der Trost der Welt liegt nicht in einer Flasche. Das weiß ich nur zu gut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001090_MAGNUS<tab>You've lost someone too?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001090_MAGNUS<tab>Hast du auch deine Familie verloren?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001100_THANCRED<tab>Not like you. Not my own flesh and blood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001100_THANCRED<tab>Ach weißt du, das ist eine komplizierte Geschichte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001110_THANCRED<tab>I grew up an orphan, so I never really knew what family meant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001110_THANCRED<tab>Ich wuchs als Waise auf. Ich weiß gar nicht so richtig, wie es ist, eine Familie zu haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001120_THANCRED<tab>Not until I met a man who offered to take me in and make me his pupil. He was a kindly soul. Always looking out for me, like a father. Not that I appreciated that at the time, or anything else for that matter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001120_THANCRED<tab>Ich hatte mal einen weisen Lehrer, den ich verehrte wie einen Vater. Aber auch er konnte mich nicht lehren, Verantwortung für das Leben eines anderen zu über<var 16 /var>nehmen. Ich konnte ja nicht einmal auf mich selber aufpassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001130_THANCRED<tab>But I finally had a family. And then...and then I robbed a young girl of hers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001130_THANCRED<tab>Doch das Schicksal ließ mir keine Wahl. Ein junges Mädchen verlor ihren Vater, weil ich ihn nicht beschützen konnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001140_THANCRED<tab>I did my best to make amends, to offer her comfort. But the more I look back on it, the more I realize just how inadequate my efforts were. I let her down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001140_THANCRED<tab>Seitdem versuchte ich, sie von allen Gefahren fernzuhalten, aber wenn ich ehrlich bin, stelle ich mich dabei nicht besonders geschickt an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001150_THANCRED<tab>That is why I refuse to let her legacy die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001150_THANCRED<tab>Deshalb will ich wenigstens das Andenken an sie bewahren und ihren Willen in Ehren halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001160_THANCRED<tab>In the end, all we can do is press on. For those we have lost. For those we can yet save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001160_THANCRED<tab>Außerdem gibt es jetzt noch etwas, um das ich mich zu kümmern habe. Ihre Zukunft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001170_THANCRED<tab>And that requires your Talos. Please, Magnus. You are our only hope of reaching Nabaath Areng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001170_THANCRED<tab>Deshalb muss ich nach Nabaath Areng. Und das geht nur, wenn du die Bergbahn in Bewegung setzt. Bitte, du musst uns helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001180_MAGNUS<tab>...What rubbish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001180_MAGNUS<tab>Schaff ich das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001190_RYNE<tab>She's not gone. No matter what you say or believe, she's not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001190_RYNE<tab>Warum sprichst du von ihr immer so, als gäbe es sie nicht mehr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001200_RYNE<tab>We can still bring her back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001200_RYNE<tab>Man kann sie doch bestimmt noch zurückholen. Dafür<var 1D /var>... Dafür bin ich doch hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001210_THANCRED<tab>You may not remember this about our Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001210_THANCRED<tab>Es wird dich vielleicht überraschen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001220_THANCRED<tab>But prior to founding the Path of the Twelve, long before the Scions, she was something of a miner.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001220_THANCRED<tab>Aber unsere Minfilia hat früher auf der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt als Mi<var 16 /var>nen<var 16 /var>ar<var 16 /var>bei<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>rin ihre Gil verdient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001230_THANCRED<tab>After her father died, F'lhaminn took her in and taught her the trade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001230_THANCRED<tab>Du weißt vermutlich, dass F'lhaminn sie nach dem Tod ihres Vaters aufgenommen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001240_THANCRED<tab>I think they were both seeking to fill the void left by a loved one. Maybe that's why she took to it so readily.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001240_THANCRED<tab>Doch F'lhaminn hatte selbst ihren Geliebten verloren und war auf sich allein gestellt. Also wollte Minfilia sich nützlich machen und begann, in einer Mine zu arbeiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001250_THANCRED<tab>Back in those days, I spent most of my time in the Quicksand or some other tavern, loosening tongues and gathering secrets. Occasionally, I'd catch a glimpse of her in the street, on her way home after another hard day's work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001250_THANCRED<tab>Hach, ist das lange her<var 1D /var>... Ich weiß noch, wie ich in einer Kneipe in Ul'dah trank und den neuesten Gerüchten lauschte. Da lief sie draußen vorbei, ihr Gesicht war ganz verdreckt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001260_THANCRED<tab>I always felt a wave of relief when I saw she'd come back safe...along with a pang of guilt at the fact I wasn't there to support her as I should've been.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001260_THANCRED<tab>Sie war mit der Arbeit fertig. Ich hätte ihr nachlaufen können<var 1D /var>- sie fragen, wie es ihr geht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001270_THANCRED<tab>Simply speaking with her more than once in a blue moon would've been a good start, but I could never bring myself to do it. Instead, I threw myself into my “work” and became every drunkard's best friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001270_THANCRED<tab>Doch ich tat es nicht. Ich vergrub lieber wieder mein Gesicht in meinem Kelch und bildete mir ein, ich hätte Wichtigeres zu tun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't imagine she thought too highly of you back then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was hielt sie denn davon?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not your finest hour, to say the least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Und so einer nennt sich großer Bruder<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001280_THANCRED<tab>Not too highly, no. She once called me a “wine-sodden wharf rat”─which wouldn't have been half as galling had it not been so accurate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001280_THANCRED<tab>Irgendwann meinte sie zu mir, ich sei ein Taugenichts, der nur den Frauen nachstellt. Womit sie nicht ganz Unrecht hatte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001290_THANCRED<tab>Far from it─and F'lhaminn has never let me live it down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001290_THANCRED<tab>Ich weiß, ich weiß. Das habe ich mir schon oft genug von ihr anhören müssen. Und auch von den anderen Exegeten. Zu Recht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001300_THANCRED<tab>But that was a lifetime ago. Here and now I have another chance to do things right, and I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> squander it again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001300_THANCRED<tab>Aber diesmal<var 1D /var>... Diesmal werde ich sie nicht enttäuschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001310_GUTHJON<tab>Hey! Come and see what I've found! You're not going to believe this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001310_GUTHJON<tab>He, kommt mal her! Das müsst ihr euch ansehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001320_THANCRED<tab>Tell me it's leonine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001320_THANCRED<tab>Hast du ein Löwenauge gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001330_GUTHJON<tab>It is, at that! You lot were born lucky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001330_GUTHJON<tab>Das kann man so sagen. Das Glück meint es wirklich gut mit euch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001340_GUTHJON<tab>It's mostly broken pieces─but look at this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001340_GUTHJON<tab>Ich hab ein paar winzige Splitter<var 1D /var>... und das hier!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001350_THANCRED<tab>This is a rather fine specimen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001350_THANCRED<tab>Das ist also ein Löwenauge. Es ist<var 1D /var>... prächtig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001360_GUTHJON<tab>It's been decades since we've found anything approaching this big! But that's not all─there's an engraving on it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001360_GUTHJON<tab>Ja, und zwar ein so großes, wie es seit Jahrzehnten nicht mehr gefunden wurde. Und schau mal<var 1D /var>... Jemand scheint sich darauf verewigt zu haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001370_THANCRED<tab>Ah, these scratches here? They're a little hard to make out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001370_THANCRED<tab>Du meinst diese Einkerbungen hier? Ja, da steht etwas<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001380_THANCRED<tab>"To my beloved Magnus and Skuli.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001380_THANCRED<tab>„Für Magnus und Skuri, ich liebe euch“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001390_GUTHJON<tab>Yes! Do you see!? It was a gift to Magnus from his wife!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001390_GUTHJON<tab>Ja, so muss es sein! Der Stein ist ein Geschenk von Agna an ihren Mann und ihren Sohn!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001400_GUTHJON<tab>She found it. She <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> found it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001400_GUTHJON<tab>Die Erzkönigin hat es tatsächlich geschafft. Sie hat den Stein gefunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001410_GUTHJON<tab>She must've spent her final hours carving this message into the stone, in the hope that he might see it one day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001410_GUTHJON<tab>Doch der Einsturz versperrte ihr den Rückweg. Mit ihren letzten Atemzügen hat sie diese Nachricht eingeritzt, im festen Glauben, dass Magnus ihn irgendwann finden würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001420_GUTHJON<tab>Those rock-backed bastards must've made off with it before we could clear a path to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001420_GUTHJON<tab>Die Steinrücken müssen ihn sich geschnappt haben, bevor wir uns zu ihr durchgraben konnten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001430_GUTHJON<tab>It's fate that brought you here to find this stone. No other explanation. Makes me wonder what else might still be buried in these parts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001430_GUTHJON<tab>Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass die Mine noch so einen Schatz hergeben würde<var 1D /var>... Was da ans Tageslicht gekommen ist, grenzt an ein Wunder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001440_URIANGER<tab>Preparations for the enchantment are complete. When the heart hath been suffused with a sufficient quantity of aether, the golem should be restored to life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001440_URIANGER<tab>So, theoretisch ist alles bereit. Sobald der Äther läuft, müsste sich der Talos in Bewegung setzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001450_THAFFE<tab>All right then. Whenever you're ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001450_THAFFE<tab>Also worauf wartest du dann noch? Los geht's!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001460_THAFFE<tab>It's working! It's working!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001460_THAFFE<tab>Er bewegt sich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001470_THAFFE<tab>M...Magnus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001470_THAFFE<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>... Meister Magnus<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001480_MAGNUS<tab>You left me for this...this wretched heap of stone and rubble...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001480_MAGNUS<tab>Da steht er nun, der Scheißkerl.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001490_MAGNUS<tab>This worthless pile of earth. And yet...I can't... I can't...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001490_MAGNUS<tab>Danke<var 1D /var>... Ich danke dir<var 1D /var>... für dieses Geschenk<var 1D /var>... meine Königin<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001500_URIANGER<tab>What troubleth thee, child?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001500_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia. Was ist mit dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001510_RYNE<tab>I shouldn't be here. I don't deserve to be. I don't deserve any of the things you've done for me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001510_RYNE<tab>Ich<var 1D /var>... Ich habe nichts, was ich jemandem hinterlassen könnte. Nichts, über das sich je jemand freuen wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001520_RYNE<tab>I'm just a burden, helpless and hopeless. If tomorrow came and I was gone, it would be better for everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001520_RYNE<tab>Ich werde nie so mutig oder so weise werden wie ihr. Ich stehe allen immer nur im Weg herum. Es wäre besser, ich wäre gar nicht hier<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001530_RYNE<tab>Thancred most of all. He'll never admit it, but I can see it in his eyes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001530_RYNE<tab>Und Thancred. Wenn er doch endlich sagen würde, was er wirklich denkt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001540_RYNE<tab>I wish he'd just say it─just say that he hates me! That he wishes I was dead so that she could return...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001540_RYNE<tab>Dass ich verschwinden soll, um der echten Minfilia Platz zu machen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001550_URIANGER<tab>None of this is thy doing, child.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001550_URIANGER<tab>Das ist alles meine Schuld.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001560_URIANGER<tab>'Twas <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who set the Oracle on her path unto the First. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who condemned you all to suffer these torments. 'Tis my sin alone, and one that will haunt me unto my dying day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001560_URIANGER<tab>Ich war es, der das Orakel des Lichts in die erste Splitter<var 16 /var>welt geschickt hat. Ich hatte keine Ahnung, was ich Thancred und dir damit antun würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001570_URIANGER<tab>Yet I dare not dwell overlong on my many regrets, for the world is a tapestry of fates, interwoven and inseparable, and we who strive to better it cannot choose but make difficult decisions. For naught of worth was ever achieved without sacrifice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001570_URIANGER<tab>Doch ich bereue es nicht. Das Leben verläuft in komplizierten Bahnen, die Geschicke sind fest miteinander verwoben. Wir, die die Welt zu bessern wünschen, können es nicht tun, ohne an anderer Stelle etwas zu opfern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001580_URIANGER<tab>And thus must man ever struggle to weigh life against loss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001580_URIANGER<tab>Deswegen müssen wir uns mit unseren Herzen vergewissern, wofür wir leben und wofür wir sterben sollen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001590_URIANGER<tab>The one for whom thou mournest beareth no grudge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001590_URIANGER<tab>Aber vielleicht ist die Antwort darauf gar nicht so schwer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001600_URIANGER<tab>Were she here, she would not suffer thee to languish in sorrow. She would tell thee to seek thine own path, thine own purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001600_URIANGER<tab>Wir wünschen uns eine Zukunft mit denen, die wir lieben<var 1D /var>... die wir liebten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001610_URIANGER<tab>It is a truth which I myself was slow to learn. Yet a truth it remaineth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001610_URIANGER<tab>Ich war stets ein Einzelgänger. Deshalb musste erst viel Zeit verstreichen, bis ich das verstand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001620_URIANGER<tab>Thou needst but have faith. Have faith and all will be well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001620_URIANGER<tab>Hab Vertrauen, Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Go to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Willst du nicht zu ihr gehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Have you no words for her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du solltest mit ihr reden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001630_THANCRED<tab>Not today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001630_THANCRED<tab>Ja, vielleicht hast du Recht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001635_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Crystarium...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001635_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Währenddessen in Crystarium ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To what do I owe the pleasure that is your extended stay?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diesmal bist du ihnen nicht gefolgt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001650_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, to the tediousness of our heroes' present endeavors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001650_EMETSELCH<tab>Im Wald habe ich erfahren, was ich wissen wollte. Von nun an sollten gelegentliche Besuche ausreichen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001660_EMETSELCH<tab>That, and the insufferable abundance of Light in Amh Araeng. I should be glad to keep my distance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001660_EMETSELCH<tab>Außerdem ist das Licht in Amh Araeng besonders stark. Darauf kann ich liebend gerne verzichten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001670_EMETSELCH<tab>I'm rather fond of sleep, you know. Wonderful way to pass the time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001670_EMETSELCH<tab>Deshalb habe ich mir etwas Ruhe gegönnt. Schlaf ist doch etwas Wundervolles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001680_EMETSELCH<tab>Not that my compeers would agree, mind you. Always on the move, the lot of them. Like Lahabrea, constantly jumping from vessel to vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001680_EMETSELCH<tab>Der alte Lahabrea tauschte rastlos einen Körper gegen den anderen, ständig war er unterwegs. Ein Wunder, dass er nicht vor Müdigkeit aus dem Leben geschieden ist. Alles hat darunter gelitten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001690_EMETSELCH<tab>Such fire, such determination! So much passion, fleeting and forgotten...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001690_EMETSELCH<tab>Seine Willenskraft, seine Erinnerung<var 1D /var>... und seine Ziel<var 16 /var>stre<var 16 /var>big<var 16 /var>keit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001700_EMETSELCH<tab>Come to think of it, Exarch, I don't believe I've ever seen <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> retire to your chambers for so much as forty winks. However do you keep your eyes from closing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001700_EMETSELCH<tab>Wann schläfst du denn eigentlich? Oder kann es sein, dass du ausreichend vorgeschlafen hast?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001710_EMETSELCH<tab>The cold shoulder. You wound me, sir.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001710_EMETSELCH<tab>Was hab ich dir bloß getan?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001720_EMETSELCH<tab>Always so guarded in our every interaction─interactions you curiously refrain from sharing with the Scions and their champion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001720_EMETSELCH<tab>Wenn du mir so sehr misstraust, warum hast du den Besuch aus dem Ursprung dann nicht vor mir gewarnt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And risk souring your budding relationship? I think not. Much as I dislike you, there are more useful targets for his energies. And I am not in the habit of pointing him at my enemies like a weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Weil er sehr wohl in der Lage ist, selbst zu entscheiden, wem er vertrauen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And risk souring your budding relationship? I think not. Much as I dislike you, there are more useful targets for her energies. And I am not in the habit of pointing her at my enemies like a weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Weil sie sehr wohl in der Lage ist, selbst zu entscheiden, wem sie vertrauen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001750_EMETSELCH<tab>Is that right? Fond of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001750_EMETSELCH<tab>So gut kennst du <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((ihn)) /var>? Es klingt ja fast so, als wärt ihr alte Bekannte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001760_EMETSELCH<tab>You continue to fascinate me, Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001760_EMETSELCH<tab>Du bist umgeben von Rätseln, Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001761_EMETSELCH<tab>But tell me: who are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001761_EMETSELCH<tab>Wer bist du wirklich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001770_EMETSELCH<tab>The once-great nation whose ingenuity gave birth to this tower was shaped by my hand. As such, I know full well the wonders it can facilitate...and those it cannot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001770_EMETSELCH<tab>Weißt du<var 1D /var>... Ich war an der Gründung und dem Aufstieg des Allagischen Reiches<var 1D /var>- wo dieser Turm erbaut wurde<var 1D /var>- nicht ganz unbeteiligt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001780_EMETSELCH<tab>There is nothing in these walls which could have aided you in summoning our dear friend across time and space.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001780_EMETSELCH<tab>Deswegen weiß ich auch, dass die Technik, mit der du <var 08 E905 ((die Heldin)) ((den Helden)) /var> in diese Welt gerufen hast, nicht aus diesem Turm stammt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001790_EMETSELCH<tab>Much less in possession of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mortal flesh! Not even <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> could have performed such a feat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001790_EMETSELCH<tab>Jemanden mitsamt seinem Körper in eine andere Welt zu zwingen<var 1D /var>... Das können nicht einmal die Ascians.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I see... You had a hand in Allag as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Im Allagischen Reich hattest du also auch deine Hand im Spiel<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You would know what I am?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dann will ich dir folgende Antwort geben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am the adjudicator of the sacred history with which you dared trifle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich bin ein Opfer eurer Ränkeschmiede, ein Stellvertreter all jener, die im Lauf der Geschichte unter euch gelitten haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am keeper of this tower's boundless wisdom. The wisdom of ages without age. Of everywhere and nowhere. The great work of those who tamed the wings of time, and grasped the nature of the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich bin der Hüter des Kristallturms und seines größten Rätsels. Das Wissen über das Heute, Gestern und Morgen, das Nirgendwo und das Überall. Das Wunderwerk derer, die den Flügel der Zeit freisetzten und hinter den Horizont des Risses blickten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis a boon born of the sacrifice of brave heroes who gave their lives for a brighter future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die, in Genialität vereint, ihr Leben dafür einsetzten, dieses Wissen zu hinterlassen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis a boon born of sacrifices yet unmade... The parting gift of brave heroes who will one day give their lives for a brighter future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die, in Genialität vereint, ihr Leben dafür einsetzen werden, dieses Wissen zu hinterlassen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will not see their hopes and dreams squandered. The history which led us here <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be unwritten. I promise you that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich stehe hier, weil mir alle Wünsche und Wunder anvertraut sind. Um gegen das Schicksal selbst aufzubegehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001870_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, it seems we are both eager to fulfill our duties, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001870_EMETSELCH<tab>Es steht viel auf dem Spiel, für uns beide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On that much we are in agreement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das tut es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001890_RYNE<tab>Urianger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001890_RYNE<tab>Urianger? Kommst du nicht mit?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001900_URIANGER<tab>Thou must needs carry on without me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001900_URIANGER<tab>Ich muss euch bitten, ohne mich weiterzureisen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001910_URIANGER<tab>The path to Nabaath Areng lieth open. Whilst thou travelest thither to the south, I would apprise Mistress Alisaie and the others of our progress.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001910_URIANGER<tab>Der Weg nach Nabaath Areng ist frei. Irgendjemand muss Alisaie und den anderen Bescheid sagen. Sie sind immer noch mit ihrem Ablenkungsmanöver beschäftigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001920_URIANGER<tab>As circumstances permit, I will thereafter rejoin the hunt for the remaining Lightwardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001920_URIANGER<tab>Wenn alles wie geplant verläuft, stehen wir bald vor einem weiteren Kampf mit einem Licht<var 16 /var>bringer. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass wir bis dahin wieder alle vereint sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001930_THANCRED<tab>Magnus. Will the gate close immediately after the trolley passes through?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001930_THANCRED<tab>Was ist mit dem Tor? Öffnet es sich nur, wenn die Bergbahn durchfährt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001940_MAGNUS<tab>No, it will stay open until someone closes it manually. Built that way to prevent any untimely accidents.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001940_MAGNUS<tab>Nein, es bleibt auch danach noch eine Weile offen, aus Sicherheitsgründen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001950_THANCRED<tab>Then you and the others can meet us in Nabaath Areng after giving the Eulmorans the slip.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001950_THANCRED<tab>Dann folgt uns, sobald ihr die Soldaten aus Eulmore vertrieben habt. Wir treffen uns in Nabaath Areng.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001960_RYNE<tab>Ah, Urianger...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001960_RYNE<tab>Urianger<var 1D /var>... Ich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001970_RYNE<tab>Thank you. For everything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001970_RYNE<tab>Danke für alles. Danke für alles, was du für mich getan hast. Pass gut auf dich auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001980_URIANGER<tab>Remember: thou needst but have faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001980_URIANGER<tab>Du auch. Du wirst sehen, wir werden auf das alles mit einem Lächeln zurückblicken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001990_MAGNUS<tab>If you've finished with your good-byes, I suggest you grab hold of something. Be a shame if you took a tumble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001990_MAGNUS<tab>Seid ihr bereit? Dann setz ich die Bahn jetzt in Bewegung. Haltet euch gut fest, es wird etwas ruckeln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002000_MAGNUS<tab>The tracks beyond the gate aren't in the best of shape, so the trolley can only go as far as Amh Malik.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002000_MAGNUS<tab>Die Bahn sollte euch bis vor den Palast von Amh Malik bringen. Allerdings ist es schon 'ne Zeit her, dass die Schienen gewartet wurden. Falls was schiefgeht, müsst ihr zu Fuß weiterlaufen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002010_MAGNUS<tab>Godsspeed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002010_MAGNUS<tab>Also dann<var 1D /var>... Gute Fahrt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002020_THANCRED<tab>Ah, that must be the gate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002020_THANCRED<tab>Da kommt das Tor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002030_THANCRED<tab>Well, so far so good...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002030_THANCRED<tab>Na, wer sagt's denn<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002040_THANCRED<tab>Wait...is that─ <var 1A 02 /var>Ran'jit<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002040_THANCRED<tab>Das ist doch<var 1D /var>... Ran'jit!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002050_RANJIT<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002050_RANJIT<tab>Hua!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002060_THANCRED<tab>(IMPACT GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002060_THANCRED<tab>Ungh<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002070_RYNE<tab>(IMPACT GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002070_RYNE<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002080_THANCRED<tab>You're a stubborn old swine, aren't you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002080_THANCRED<tab>Ich hab doch tatsächlich gedacht, dich wären wir los.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002090_RANJIT<tab>One who has mastered Gukumatz fears not the blackest pit or the fieriest hell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002090_RANJIT<tab>Pah. Mein Leben wird nicht auf dem Boden eines Abgrunds enden. Nicht solange ich auf Gukumatz zählen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002100_RANJIT<tab>Your deeds in the east did not go unnoticed. Long have I lain in wait, and sure enough, you did not disappoint.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002100_RANJIT<tab>Mir war natürlich sofort klar, dass eure Aktion im Osten nur ein Ablenkungsmanöver ist. Also habe ich mich wieder an eure Fersen geheftet<var 1D /var>- aber ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass ich euch so leicht zu packen bekomme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002110_RANJIT<tab>Had you only sworn fealty to Lord Vauthry, you would have no cause to skulk about like frightened animals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002110_RANJIT<tab>Seht ihr ein, wie sinnlos euer Widerstand ist? Wollt ihr wirklich lieber im Dreck herumkriechen, als die Ordnung meines Herrn anzuerkennen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002120_RYNE<tab>(STRUGGLING TO RISE GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002120_RYNE<tab>Urgh ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002130_RANJIT<tab>You will remain as you are, while I dispatch these villains.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002130_RANJIT<tab>Ah, Minfilia. Du bist zu bemitleiden. Warte, ich befreie dich von diesem Ungeziefer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002140_RYNE<tab>No! I won't...! I won't let you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002140_RYNE<tab>Nein! Lass sie in Ruhe!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002150_RANJIT<tab>You forget to whom you speak! Who armed you? Trained you? Fought and killed a thousand sin eaters with you!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002150_RANJIT<tab>Was soll das? Ich habe dich jedes Mal aufgespürt und großgezogen. Wir haben gegen mehr Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger gekämpft, als ich zählen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002160_RANJIT<tab>And when you were inevitably cut down and lay lifeless in my arms─who sought out your successor to carry on the futile struggle again and again!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002160_RANJIT<tab>Doch was hat es gebracht? Immer und immer wieder lief es nur auf eins hinaus: deinen Tod!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002170_RANJIT<tab>We seek to bring peace to what is left of this shattered land, while these mad fools would only bring further chaos down upon us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002170_RANJIT<tab>Und jetzt verleiten dich diese Ratten dazu, an ihrem schwachsinnigen Kampf teilzunehmen und die Ordnung der Welt niederzureißen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002180_RANJIT<tab>Do not be deceived, child! Only by Lord Vauthry's hand will this dying world know a sliver of salvation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002180_RANJIT<tab>Lass dich nicht von ihnen verführen! Nur einer kann dich für immer von deinem Leid erlösen. Mein Herr, Lord Vauthry!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002190_RYNE<tab>I don't know about the world...but I never asked to be saved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002190_RYNE<tab>Nein. Das ist nicht die Erlösung, die ich suche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002200_RYNE<tab>However much it hurts, and however hard it gets, it's my life, and I want to live it on my own terms!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002200_RYNE<tab>Meine Schmerzen, meine Zweifel und mein Leid sind ein Beweis dafür, was sie und ich auf dieser Reise bisher erreicht haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002210_RYNE<tab>And those “mad fools” you want me to abandon? The ones I've traveled with, fought with, and may one day die with─they feel the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002210_RYNE<tab>Jedes Wort, das sie zu mir gesagt haben, hüte ich wie einen Schatz. Jeden Moment, den wir zusammen verbracht haben, trage ich in meinem Herzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002220_RYNE<tab>So no, I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be deceived! No matter what you say, I refuse to believe it's all for nothing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002220_RYNE<tab>Diese Erinnerungen nehmen mir jede Last von den Schultern. Sie sind mir wichtiger als alles andere in der Welt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002230_RYNE<tab>They're everything to me. All I have and all I need. And I would gladly do anything for them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002230_RYNE<tab>Ich liebe sie. Ohne sie wäre ich<var 1D /var>... wäre ich nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002240_RYNE<tab>Let us pass, or kill me. I'm not leaving here without them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002240_RYNE<tab>Dich brauche ich nicht mehr. Also geh zur Seite und lass uns durch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002250_RANJIT<tab>How <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> you! Very well─if you would cast your lot with villains, then you shall share their fate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002250_RANJIT<tab>So ein Blödsinn. Die Störenfriede haben dir den Kopf verdreht, aber ich werde dich schon wieder zur Vernunft bringen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002251_RANJIT<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002251_RANJIT<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002260_THANCRED<tab>I heard what you said. And I'm sorry for all the things I've left unspoken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002260_THANCRED<tab>Ich verstehe dich besser, als du meinst. Auch wenn ich es dir nie sagen konnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002270_THANCRED<tab>You have to go. Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002270_THANCRED<tab>Und jetzt lauf! Ich kümmere mich um den hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002280_RYNE<tab>Thancred, no─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002280_RYNE<tab>Aber<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002290_THANCRED<tab>Go! Do what you came here to do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002290_THANCRED<tab>Tu nur, was <var 1A 02 /var>du<var 1A 01 /var> für richtig hältst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002300_THANCRED<tab>I'll not have you waste that newfound resolve on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002300_THANCRED<tab>Ich komm schon zurecht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002310_THANCRED<tab>I leave her in your hands. Hurry!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002310_THANCRED<tab>Kümmer dich um sie. Bring sie zu Minfilia!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002320_THANCRED<tab>Not another step! Your fight is with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002320_THANCRED<tab>Für mich ist sie Schwester und Tochter, und ich lasse nicht zu, dass du ihr etwas antust!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002330_RANJIT<tab>You think yourself her protector!? Hah! As if a whelp like you could be a better father to her than me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002330_RANJIT<tab>Du hältst dich für ihren Vater? Du bist doch selbst nur ein unreifer Stümper!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002340_RANJIT<tab>You would have her suffer and die. I would spare her that fate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002340_RANJIT<tab>Das Mädchen ist unter einem Unglücksstern geboren. Ihr Leid wird niemals enden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002350_THANCRED<tab>That is not for you or anyone else to decide─ever again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002350_THANCRED<tab>Ich werde sie beschützen. Solange sie das will.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002360_THANCRED<tab>(PANTING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002360_THANCRED<tab>Ha ... ha ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002370_THANCRED<tab>Not a single day goes by that I don't think about all that you have given me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002370_THANCRED<tab>Kein Tag vergeht in dieser Welt, an dem ich nicht daran denke, was du mir alles gegeben hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002380_THANCRED<tab>Countless memories and moments I took for granted... Gods, you grew up so fast.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002380_THANCRED<tab>Wie schnell du erwachsen wurdest<var 1D /var>... Während ich sorglos in den Tag hinein lebte und meine Zeit verschwendete.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002390_THANCRED<tab>But you had to, didn't you? For those you had lost. For those you could yet save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002390_THANCRED<tab>Ich erinnere mich so deutlich<var 1D /var>... Ich weiß noch ganz genau, was du damals zu mir gesagt hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002400_THANCRED<tab>A world teetering on the very brink of oblivion, for which you gave your everything without hesitation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002400_THANCRED<tab>Du wolltest die Liebe, die du selbst erfahren hast, in die ganze Welt hinaustragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002410_THANCRED<tab>Your kindness, your compassion, your love... Then and now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002410_THANCRED<tab>Deine Güte und dein Mitgefühl stellen mich auf die Probe<var 1D /var>... Damals<var 1D /var>... wie heute<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002420_THANCRED<tab>One last time, with a little help. I'm so proud to have been a part of your life...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002420_THANCRED<tab>Wenigstens dieses eine Mal werde ich dich nicht enttäuschen. Ich bin doch<var 1D /var>... dein großer Bruder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002430_THANCRED<tab>Oh, Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002430_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002440_RYNE<tab>Is this─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002440_RYNE<tab>Da ist was!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002450_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEA<tab>Run for your lives! It's the Flood! The Flood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002450_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEA<tab>Flieht! Das Licht kommt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002460_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEB<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002460_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEB<tab>Uaaahhh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002470_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEC<tab>The end is nigh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002470_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEC<tab>Das ist das Ende!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002480_NABAATHARENGPEOPLED<tab>Look! Th-There's somebody up there! On top of the palace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002480_NABAATHARENGPEOPLED<tab>Seht nur! Da oben ist jemand!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002490_MINFILIA<tab>(EFFORT GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002490_MINFILIA<tab>Hrrrgh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002500_MINFILIA<tab>No. Stand back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002500_MINFILIA<tab>Nein. Du nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002510_MINFILIA<tab>We shall stay the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002510_MINFILIA<tab>Es<var 1D /var>... Es geht auch so.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But this is what I want! It's my sacrifice to make!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Warum? Ich bin bereit!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002530_MINFILIA<tab>Your time has not yet come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002530_MINFILIA<tab>Nein. Deine Zeit ist noch nicht gekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002540_MINFILIA<tab>When all hangs in the balance, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> must give them hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002540_MINFILIA<tab>Warte. Warte auf den Tag, an dem du diese Welt wirklich retten wirst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002560_RYNE<tab>This place...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002560_RYNE<tab>Wo sind wir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002570_RYNE<tab>You... You're...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002570_RYNE<tab>Du<var 1D /var>... Du bist die echte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002580_MINFILIA<tab>Ours is a meeting long overdue. Full glad am I that we may finally speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002580_MINFILIA<tab>Ihr habt mich gefunden. Ich bin wirklich überglücklich, euch hier zu treffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's good to see you again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir haben uns so lange nicht gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've come at Thancred's behest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thancred wäre so gerne mitgekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002590_MINFILIA<tab>My dear, sweet child... Yours is a burden none should ever be forced to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002590_MINFILIA<tab>Du bist das liebe Mädchen, das meine Seele so gut behütet hat. Ich wollte dir schon lange etwas sagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002600_MINFILIA<tab>Such pain and suffering you have endured, yet still you came. For this and more, I thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002600_MINFILIA<tab>Es tut mir leid, was für ein schweres Schicksal du auf deinen Schultern tragen musst. Und ich danke dir, dass du es so tapfer angenommen hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002610_RYNE<tab>I've lost count of the times I've almost given up. If people hadn't helped me every step of the way, I never would have made it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002610_RYNE<tab>Ich dachte, ich schaffe es nicht. Aber ich hatte Freunde, die bei mir waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002620_MINFILIA<tab>Yet here you stand, resolved. Now...tell me your heart's desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002620_MINFILIA<tab>Also, sag mir bitte in deinen eigenen Worten: Was wünschst du dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002630_RYNE<tab>To defeat the sin eaters, and bring this world back from the brink!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002630_RYNE<tab>Ich möchte meinen Freunden helfen, die Licht<var 16 /var>bringer zu besiegen und diese Welt zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002640_RYNE<tab>The remaining Wardens have hidden themselves from us. But with the power of the Oracle, I thought we might be able to find them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002640_RYNE<tab>Aber sie verstecken sich. Kannst du sie mit deiner Gabe finden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Indeed you could. Their radiance would be unmistakable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Ja, ich glaube schon. Man müsste dahin gehen, wo das Licht am stärksten ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002660_MINFILIA<tab>But know, my child, that the power you seek will come at a price.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002660_MINFILIA<tab>Allerdings wird das nur mit den vollen Kräften des Orakels gelingen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002670_MINFILIA<tab>We stand now at the crossroads. A decision must be made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002670_MINFILIA<tab>Um weiterzugehen, muss eine Entscheidung getroffen werden. Wir stehen an einem Scheideweg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002680_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis only natural to be afraid. To hesitate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002680_MINFILIA<tab>Wie jede wichtige Entscheidung erfordert auch diese großen Mut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002690_MINFILIA<tab>But for your many trials, you have grown stronger and wiser. And with the love and support of those you hold dear, you have grown to love yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002690_MINFILIA<tab>Doch ich glaube, mit deinen Freunden an deiner Seite brauchst du dich nicht davor zu fürchten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002700_RYNE<tab>The Flood has washed away so much of this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002700_RYNE<tab>Vor einhundert Jahren kam die Lichtflut und hat fast alles vernichtet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002710_RYNE<tab>So many people and places and possibilities─and all the heroes who fought to protect them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002710_RYNE<tab>Unzählige Leben, fruchtbares Land und<var 1D /var>... aufrichtige Helden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002720_RYNE<tab>Yet here the Scions are, trying so, so hard to help those few of us who remain. And seeing how tirelessly they work, how completely committed they are to the cause...I can't help but believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002720_RYNE<tab>Dann kamen sie. Neue Helden von weit weg. Ich habe sie gesehen und bin ihnen gefolgt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002730_RYNE<tab>But I want to do more than just watch and cheer. I want to make a difference.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002730_RYNE<tab>Ich bin noch ein Kind und es gibt vieles, das ich nicht weiß. Aber wenn ich darf, möchte ich gerne bei ihnen bleiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002740_RYNE<tab>I want to help them, like they helped me─and maybe even inspire others to do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002740_RYNE<tab>Auch wenn wir scheitern, wenn wir nichts erreichen<var 1D /var>... dann möchte ich wenigstens etwas an die weitergeben, die nach uns kommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002750_RYNE<tab>Coming together, providing for one another─that's the only way forward I can see. Since all of our heroes are gone, we'll just have to make heroes of ourselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002750_RYNE<tab>Es gibt eine Verbindung<var 1D /var>... von Helden zu Helden, die uns für eine bessere Zukunft kämpfen lässt. Davon möchte ich ein Teil sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002760_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis a beautiful, wonderful dream. One we share.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002760_MINFILIA<tab>Das ist ein schöner Traum, der richtige Traum. Ich habe mir einst etwas ganz Ähnliches gewünscht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002770_MINFILIA<tab>Though my power was all but spent in staying the Flood, I prayed this final act would give hope to those who survived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002770_MINFILIA<tab>Ich wollte, dass der Glaube an Minfilia den Bewohnern dieser Welt ein Licht der Hoffnung ist, damit sie vereint gegen die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger kämpfen und so irgendwann wirklich ihre Welt retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002780_MINFILIA<tab>That selfsame hope lives on in you. It gives me comfort to know that the future is in capable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002780_MINFILIA<tab>Du hast meinen Traum weitergeträumt. Da habe ich allen Grund, stolz auf mich zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002790_MINFILIA<tab>If ever you should falter, remember this: no one, however powerful, is immune to the whisperings of doubt and despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002790_MINFILIA<tab>Egal, wie stark du wirst. Irgendwann kommen immer Zweifel und schwächen dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002800_MINFILIA<tab>Do not give in to them, but do not deny them either. Look instead to the light within, that you may continue to serve as a beacon to others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002800_MINFILIA<tab>Aber gib nicht auf, liebes Mädchen, das meinen Traum im Herzen trägt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002810_RYNE<tab>Thank you, Minfilia, for believing in us. For believing in me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002810_RYNE<tab>Du hast immer an mich und das Gute in dieser Welt geglaubt. Danke, Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002820_MINFILIA<tab>Dearest friend...no words can express my gratitude to you for keeping her safe in these tumultuous times. You are a hero to us both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002820_MINFILIA<tab>Auch dir danke ich von ganzem Herzen. Du warst für mich die Morgenröte, die die Dunkelheit vertreibt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002830_MINFILIA<tab>But not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002830_MINFILIA<tab>Vergiss nie: Du kämpfst nicht allein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002840_MINFILIA<tab>Only <var 1A 02 /var>together<var 1A 01 /var> may you change the fate of two worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002840_MINFILIA<tab>Wenn die Helden zweier Welten ihre Kräfte vereinen, können sie dem Schicksal einen neuen Weg bahnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002850_THANCRED<tab>Ah, there you are. We were worried.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002850_THANCRED<tab>Hallo. Habt ihr auch alles gut überstanden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002860_ALISAIE<tab>Really? <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> wasn't the one that nearly got <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> killed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002860_ALISAIE<tab>Was heißt hier „auch gut überstanden“? Thancred, du hast ganz schön was abbekommen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>It's a good thing Urianger called on us when he did. You were at death's door when we found you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>Urianger hat uns extra hergerufen, damit wir dich wieder zusammenflicken. Als ich dich gesehen habe, ist mir fast das Herz stehen<var 16 /var>geblieben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002880_THANCRED<tab>But thanks to your timely ministrations, I was not obliged to walk through it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002880_THANCRED<tab>Hehe. Da sieht man mal wieder: Heiler haben viele Freunde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Minfilia...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>... Du hast dich<var 1D /var>... verändert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002900_THANCRED<tab>You saw her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002900_THANCRED<tab>Ihr habt euch also endlich getroffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002910_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I know I haven't exactly been pulling my weight up till now, but that's all going to change, starting today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002910_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)Ich<var 1D /var>... werde mir jetzt noch mehr Mühe geben. Beim Kämpfen und<var 1D /var>... überhaupt bei allem.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002920_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I'll do whatever it takes─whatever it takes to make Minfilia's dream a reality.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002920_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)Vielleicht reicht es nicht. Aber ich will alles tun, damit Minfilias Traum wahr wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002930_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I can track the Lightwardens now. Maybe even help you fight them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002930_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)Ich weiß jetzt, wo der Licht<var 16 /var>bringer ist. Ich kann euch zu ihm führen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002940_THANCRED<tab>I'm glad you're back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002940_THANCRED<tab>Ich hab dich vermisst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002950_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)You don't have to say that, you know...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002950_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)Wirklich? Meinst du das ernst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002960_THANCRED<tab>But I want to. You're family. How else would I feel?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002960_THANCRED<tab>Natürlich. Wir sind doch Familie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>She will need a name.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>Also. Wie wollen wir sie denn jetzt nennen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>A name?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Braucht sie denn einen neuen Namen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>A name of her own. I would not have her walk in the shadow of another any longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>Sie hat ihren Weg gewählt und sich selbst ein neues Schicksal gegeben. Ich denke, damit hat sie sich auch einen eigenen Namen verdient.
