source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>And I think it a fitting tribute to our departed friend too. At the mention of Minfilia, I would remember the woman who preserved our fellowship when all seemed lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Wichtiger aber ist, dass wir sie richtig von unserer Minfilia unterscheiden können, der vom Bund der Morgenröte. Ich komm ja selbst schon ganz durcheinander.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003010_ALISAIE<tab>Do you remember what you were called before you were taken to Eulmore?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003010_ALISAIE<tab>Erinnerst du dich an deinen Namen, bevor man dich nach Eulmore gebracht hat?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003020_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)I'm sorry, I don't. I couldn't have been very old when it happened.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003020_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)Nein. Ich war noch zu klein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003030_YSHTOLA<tab>Then we must think of a new name. Suggestions?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003030_YSHTOLA<tab>Dann müssen wir uns wohl einen ausdenken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>If the lady herself has no preference, I think the honor should rightly fall to Thancred. After all they have been through together, he's practically a father to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich denke, die Ehre sollte dir zukommen, Thancred. Es wird eure Familienbande um ein weiteres Quäntchen enger knüpfen<var 1D /var>- herzlichen Glückwunsch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003050_ALISAIE<tab>Well spotted! I'm so glad you're here to explain these things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003050_ALISAIE<tab>Du hörst es. Mein einfühlsamer Bruder bringt es mal wieder galant auf den Punkt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>And what exactly is that supposed to mean?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was habe ich denn gesagt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003070_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, nothing...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003070_ALISAIE<tab>Ach, nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003080_THANCRED<tab>What about... Ryne?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003080_THANCRED<tab>Wie wär es mit<var 1D /var>... Ryne?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003090_URIANGER<tab>Ah. “Blessing” in Fae...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003090_URIANGER<tab>Das Wort für Glück in der Sprache der Feen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003100_URIANGER<tab>Wait! Doth this mean thou wert <var 1A 02 /var>listening<var 1A 01 /var> when I delivered my lectures on the pixies?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003100_URIANGER<tab>Thancred, sag bloß, du hast dir gemerkt, was ich dir über die Feensprache beigebracht habe?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003110_THANCRED<tab>Not exactly. But that one word made an impression.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003110_THANCRED<tab>Nicht wirklich. Aber das Wort klang so gut, da ist es wohl irgendwie hängengeblieben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003120_THANCRED<tab>Of course, if it's not to your liking, I can think of something else.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003120_THANCRED<tab>Wenn dir der Name nicht gefällt, suchen wir dir einen anderen aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003130_RYNE<tab>Ryne... Yes, I rather like the sound of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003130_RYNE<tab>(-Minfilia-)Ryne<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003140_RYNE<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003140_RYNE<tab>Der Name klingt wirklich schön. Danke!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003150_THANCRED<tab>That settles it, then. Welcome aboard, Ryne!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003150_THANCRED<tab>Also gut, dann ist es entschieden. Ryne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003160_RYNE<tab>I won't let you down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003160_RYNE<tab>Ja. Ich heiße Ryne!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003170_THAFFE<tab>Don't get me wrong, I'm glad those travelers made it all the way to Nabaath Areng...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003170_THAFFE<tab>Immerhin sieht es so aus, als hätten sie es nach Nabaath Areng geschafft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003180_THAFFE<tab>But when Urianger told me the Talos was in pieces, and the trolley didn't look much better, I couldn't help wondering what in the hells had gone on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003180_THAFFE<tab>Aber was ist da bloß passiert? Der Talos lag da, die Bahn lag da<var 1D /var>... Und wenn Urianger uns nicht gerufen hätte, lägen sie da immer noch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003190_MAGNUS<tab>What indeed. At least the heart is in one piece. The rest is replaceable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003190_MAGNUS<tab>Zum Glück ist das Herz heil geblieben. Damit können wir den Talos wieder in Gang setzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003200_MAGNUS<tab>Looking at this mess, though, it's a miracle they survived...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003200_MAGNUS<tab>Und was die Fremden angeht, brauchen wir uns keine Sorgen zu machen. Die können auf sich selber aufpassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003210_THAFFE<tab>Heh, you can say that again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003210_THAFFE<tab>Wollen wir's hoffen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003220_THAFFE<tab>Wha─ What the!? Are you seeing this!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003220_THAFFE<tab>Was ist das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003230_MAGNUS<tab>The sky, it's... It...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003230_MAGNUS<tab>Seht nur<var 1D /var>... Der Himmel!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003240_ALISAIE<tab>At last. Night has returned to Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003240_ALISAIE<tab>Endlich. Endlich ist Amh Araeng auch vom Licht befreit<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003250_ALISAIE<tab>We'll save this broken world yet, Tesleen. You see if we don't...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003250_ALISAIE<tab>Jetzt werden deine Patienten sicher bald wieder gesund, Tesleen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003260_ALPHINAUD<tab>No doubt retreating in the wake of the Warden's demise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das sind Militärschiffe aus Eulmore. Sie haben den dunklen Himmel gesehen und ziehen sich zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>Back to Kholusia. The last refuge of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>Vier Licht<var 16 /var>bringer sind besiegt. Jetzt ist nur noch Kholusia vom Licht bedeckt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003280_THANCRED<tab>Home to our dear Lord Vauthry─who will no doubt do everything in his power to thwart us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003280_THANCRED<tab>Vauthry wird uns alles entgegenwerfen. Jetzt geht es schließlich um seine letzte Bastion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>As well he should, for defeat there would spell the end for both him and his heavenly host.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja. Uns steht nicht nur der letzte Licht<var 16 /var>bringer bevor, sondern auch die Konfrontation mit Eulmore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003300_ALPHINAUD<tab>There the fate of this star shall be decided.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bringen wir es zu Ende!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>So this is where you've been hiding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wen haben wir denn da? Einen Eindringling<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why did you stay behind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Warum bist du dieses Mal nicht mitgekommen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sometimes the dead would rather not be disturbed. But enough about me─what of Amh Araeng?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Irgendjemand muss doch das Haus hüten. Wie ist es euch in Amh Araeng ergangen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I see. Minfilia's gone, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia hat also ihre Bestimmung gefunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Which means the reason I must suffer this purgatory shall forever remain a mystery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nur meine kenne ich immer noch nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What's the matter? Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was ist? Geht's dir nicht gut?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003350_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003350_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003360_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What...what just happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003360_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was<var 1D /var>... Was war das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>There...there was something Minfilia said to me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Jetzt verstehe ich, was Minfilia mir sagen wollte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Minfilia sprach von zwei Helden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003370_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia said my time had not yet come. That I still had a role to play.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003370_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sie sagte mir, dass meine Zeit noch nicht gekommen sei. Dass ich irgendwann die Welt retten würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ist mein Schicksal etwa<var 1D /var>... mit dir verbunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No─ No, it couldn't be. There's only one hero in this room, and it is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> me. I'm just a shadow, cursed to wander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ach, was rede ich da. Ich bin schon lange kein Held mehr. Ich rette nichts und niemanden<var 1D /var>... Ich bin ein Geist!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ahem. Forgive the intrusion, but Minfilia─that is, Ryne and the others were asking after you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ähm, entschuldige die Störung<var 1D /var>... Minfilia<var 1D /var>- ich meine Ryne<var 1D /var>- sagte, dass sie sich Sorgen um dich macht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Is everything all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also? Wie geht es dir? Es ist doch bestimmt nicht so schlimm, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003420_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That pain again? And did it pass?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003420_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ein weiterer Schub? Gerade eben? Geht es dir wieder gut?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank goodness for that. I would not wish to see you suffer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es hat sich gelegt? Dann ist ja gut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though I know only too well how much you have suffered on our behalf in recent days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nein<var 1D /var>... genau genommen ist gar nichts gut. Wir verlangen viel zu viel von dir. Die ständigen Kämpfe gegen die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger laugen dich aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed, I have no right to impose upon you further. Nevertheless, I must ask one thing of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es ist meine Schuld. Ich bin zu weit gegangen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That you survive this, no matter what.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mir liegt nichts mehr am Herzen als deine Gesundheit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When the dust settles, you <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> return to your world. For the battles to come and the wars yet unwon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn das hier alles vorbei ist, wirst du nach Hause zurückkehren. Du wirst deine Abenteuer fortsetzen, in einer Welt, in der keine Achte Katastrophe eintreten wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The final Lightwarden is all that stands between us and victory. There is still much we must do to prepare, but for now, I will see if there is aught that may remedy the strange affliction which plagues you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dafür muss nur noch ein Licht<var 16 /var>bringer besiegt werden. Bitte, halte solange noch durch. Ich werde mich in der Zwischenzeit damit beschäftigen, wie wir deine Verwandlung aufhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see it through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde ihn zur Strecke bringen, verlass dich drauf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The end is finally in sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Dann hat der Kampf hier endlich ein Ende<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>When the Warden is dead, will your work finally be done?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wirst du dann erreicht haben, was du dir vorgenommen hast?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Of that I have no doubt. Even if I had my pick of every reflection's heroes, I could not have asked for a finer champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Daran habe ich keinen Zweifel. Schließlich rief ich <var 08 E905 ((die stärkste)) ((den stärksten)) /var> aller Helden herbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed it is. But for now put all such concerns from your mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich weiß, es ist hart. Deswegen ist es am besten, wenn du dich jetzt noch etwas ausruhst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yes, I believe it will. Once the tyranny of light is ended, the people of the Crystarium will be safe, and the future that must be shall come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, in der Tat. Wenn wir das Licht zurückdrängen, sind meine Leute gerettet. Und noch jemand, den ich unbedingt retten möchte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I'll not keep you from your rest any longer. Take as much time as you like.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_003520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also dann, entschuldige nochmals die plötzliche Störung. Wir sehen uns in Kürze.
